title: Create Recipe Card
description: Generate a recipe card for a recipe.

ingredients.Name: ingredients
ingredients.Description: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line (separate lines with \n).

instructions.Name: instructions
instructions.Description: The instructions to make the recipe. One step per line (separate lines with \n).

readyInMinutes.Name: readyInMinutes
readyInMinutes.Description: The number of minutes it takes to get the recipe on the table.

servings.Name: servings
servings.Description: The number of servings the recipe makes.

mask.Name: mask
mask.Description: The mask to put over the recipe image ("ellipseMask", "diamondMask", "starMask", "heartMask", "potMask", "fishMask").

image.Name: image
image.Description: The binary image of the recipe as jpg.

imageUrl.Name: imageUrl
imageUrl.Description: If you do not sent a binary image you can also pass the image URL.

backgroundColor.Name: backgroundColor
backgroundColor.Description: The background color for the recipe card as a hex-string.

fontColor.Name: fontColor
fontColor.Description: The font color for the recipe card as a hex-string.

quota: Calling this endpoint requires 1 point. Learn more about quotas.
